title: FolkArt Acrylic Paint Set (2-Ounce), PROMOFAI Colors I (18 Colors)
description: Make the FolkArt PROMOFAI Acrylic Paint Set your choice for all your arts and crafts. Each of these 18 superior quality acrylic paints, has a creamy, smooth consistency with excellent coverage. From beautiful hand paintings to stylish stenciling and design techniques, FolkArt delivers outstanding results! Whether you are a novice or expert crafter, you'll love the versatility of this acrylic paint set as part of your arts and crafts supplies. Use this set on a variety of surfaces such as wood, terra cotta, canvas, and so much more. A preferred brand among crafters, painters, and artists, FolkArt PROMOFAI Acrylic Paint is a staple in any crafting collection
